1.text: “For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.

2.text: If you cling to your life, you will lose it; but if you give up your life for me, you will find it.

3.text: And whatever you do or say, do it as a representative of the Lord Jesus, giving thanks through him to God the Father.
